body.name: 4K Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth, ELEPHAS Outdoor Movie Projector with NETFLIX/Prime Video/YouTube Built-in, 100,000+ Apps Supported, Video Projector Compatible with HDMI/USB/iOS/Android/Windows
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs
features: 【4K Projector & 1000 ANSI Lumen】Experience peak visual quality with ELEPHAS’ latest advanced WiFi projector. Precision-made glass lenses with superior optical performance and high purity provide impeccably even image distribution, eliminating any trace of edge blur. It improves image brightness, clarity and rich color spectrum, resulting in 20,000 Lux color fidelity. Tailored to perform well in both indoor and outdoor environments, it is a testament to uncompromising quality and performance.

【Netflix, Youtube and Prime Video, etc】ELEPHAS projector has a built-in "App Store", allowing you to easily download your favorite applications. It is also compatible with more than 100,000 advanced applications such as Netflix, Youtube and Prime Video, and can play genuine movie videos without considering copyright, bringing the ultimate movie-watching experience. Portable projectors can be mounted on a tripod, table or ceiling, giving you the flexibility to set up according to your needs.

【Ultra Fast Dual Band WiFi and Bluetooth】 ELEPHAS WiFi projector provides 5G/2.4G dual band WiFi connection, which is faster, has larger data transmission capacity, and lower latency compared to 2.4G networks. It can freely mirror videos/photos/games on smartphones or other Miracast enabled devices, and supports Bluetooth 5.2 function, stable connection with Bluetooth headphones, speakers, AirPods, and built-in stereo speakers and Dolby sound effects, Truly bringing home theater experience.

【AUTO FOCUS PROJECTOR + AUTO KEYSTONE】Easily get a clear, aligned image after turning on the projector! The 4K projector uses advanced single anti-focus technology, 30W camera gyroscope and sensor, which can accurately detect real-time motion and adjust the picture accordingly to ensure a clear picture. Save yourself the trouble of manual adjustments. The portable projector features autofocus and auto-trapezoid technology (±30° horizontal, vertical), making it easy to set up for movies or games.

【Super Long Energy Consumption and Premium After-Sales】The portable projector adopts the latest SmarEco technology, which minimizes the power consumption of the lamp and extends the lamp life to 100,000 hours. ±50% zoom adapts to different screen sizes without affecting image quality. Take your outdoor projector anywhere with the free bag. ELEPHAS's friendly customer support and 3-year warranty keep you completely worry-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price, everyone that has been over to watch movies on it has been thoroughly amazed at how beautiful the picture looks for such an inexpensive projector, and this is projected on a 150" portable cloth screen! The picture is bright, colorful and detailed. Setup is a breeze and it has apps you can use to stream your favorite movies and shows through wi-fi. It is a great portable projector for moving around, watching movies outside and we plan to take it camping sometimes as well. Would highly recommend if you want to dip your toes into the projector world as a first projector. Speakers are pretty good as well, though you can't beat having the projector hooked up to a surround sound system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Automatic features setting up the projector are excellent
reviews.reviewText: Having had a projector several years ago I was expecting the setup to be more challenging. Out of the box it was simple and easy to setup. Auto Focus, Auto Keystone, connecting to WiFi and streaming services like Amazon Prime Video took minutes and the User Manual was easy to follow. Picture quality in a bright room was excellent too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to connect.
reviews.reviewText: I used this projector in my detached garage on a white wall looks great with no screen. Easy to connect to WiFi and Bluetooth once you read directions!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From a corner to the middle
reviews.reviewText: I like it! I placed it on top of a corner bookshelf and it projects nicely in the middle of the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love to have one !!!
reviews.reviewText: we were happy to purchase this one right before Christmas, kids all play with Game and watched movie as big Suprise beautiful and the sound good enough without need to add more speaker or sound system,love it Good to have one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product great quality sound and pictures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After reading many of the reviews and seeing the price I couldn’t pass up this projector. The picture is beautiful, the colors are bright, and auto focus makes it better than I could have ever imagined. 100% recommend purchasing this projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it! Better then tv!
reviews.reviewText: The picture is so clear! I am very impressed with the quality of this projector. It does dim during the day but it’s not bad at all if you have black out blinds in the room it’s in like we have you can watch it crystal clear all day we’ll be buying more of these for other rooms
